description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. \\n\\
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence intends to procure force air heaters under the terms of a Request for Proposal (RFP) with amendment number 002.

### Solicitation Details

| Title | Radiateur électrique (Force Air Heater) |
| --- | --- |
| Soldier Appearance Number (SARNO) | 4520 |
| National Stock Number (NSN) | 4520-20-A0X-6934 |
| Part Number | C300L-10.75-1NM |
| Quantity | 12 units |
| Unit of Issue | 1 unit |
| Delivery Address | CFB Halifax |

The requirement includes an option to procure an additional 40 units within 12 months from contract award.

### Technical Requirements

The proposed system must include the following specifications:

* Brand name and model (or Part Number) and NCAGE
* Technical documentation to demonstrate compliance with the requirements
* Compliance with relevant standards and regulations

### Documents

The complete RFP package, including amendment 002, is available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website for download:

[English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/10/fb446938bb02c23114ac6047e638fe2d/w8472-235894_rfp_amd_002_eng.pdf)
[French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/10/641d5db3f9a55e2beb67e4b933f0d770/w8472-235894_rfp_amend_002_fren.pdf)

### Important Details

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and NCAGE.
* The RFP closing date is March 6, 2023, at 14:00 EST.
* The expected contract start and end dates are not specified.

### Contact Information

Department of National Defence
455 boul de la carriere, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7
